attributes.action: The creation of an English parliament for the English, and the right for self government for the English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the English be the only nationality in the UK that does not have its own parliament, this will bring us into line with the other countries and allow the English to select the government that it wants.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
